tag_list: murli-ramkrishnan, iproperty-com-india, studio-high, horizon-infoventures-pvt-ltd, realacres-com, digital-agency-india
overview:
Chairman & Managing Director - iProperty.com India Founder and MD - Studio HIGH Group - Leading Digital Agency

Murli, co-founder of Horizon InfoVenutures Pvt Ltd is responsible for the company’s corporate strategy and implementation of the technology to leverage all facets of the business. Murli holds a Bachelor degree Engineering in honours and specialized in Information Technology, conceptualized and structured the backbone of the Company’s business model and continues to direct its growth strategies. Murli in 28, exhaustively and aggressivly researched the industry and each of its segments in order to assemble the most effective management team to develop, expand and launch his vision. One of his previous experiences included Indiaâ€™s leading matrimony portal, BharatMatrimony.com withhands on start up experience with ClickJobs.com. His success in creating profitable concepts stems from a combination of effective management skills, synergistic strategic alliances, operational efficiency, quality control and work ethic.

Murli also founded Studio HIGH, a full service digital agency in India which bagged excellence award in innovation and is one of the leading Agency in the country.

He was honored by Czech Republic Government for excellence in creative and was the finalist in Business World’s “Young Entrepreneur 2010”. Murli played a key role in bagging the “RED Herring Asia Award” at Hongkong, where the company was awarded as the best Pvt Company among 16 countries in 2007. Company has won the prestigious “CNBC Asia Pacific Property Award” at Singapore in year 2009. Murli was recently honored as the “Young Entrepreneur India Award 2011” at WatAwards - India’s Digital Stalwarts.
